content: this cowl was designed for our lys to wear to rhinebeck last year we all wore the baa-ble hat 1 so we opted for a cowl to compliment the hat after many tries and tweaks this variation was born the chart is simple and big making it a perfect first color work project approximate yardage by color main color = 100 yards secondary color cc = 100 yards white = 50 yards black = 25 yards 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/baa-ble-hat
